headline.main: DENTZ SEES FRANCE RISING IN 25 YEARS; Peace May Be Hard, General Says Before Darlan

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Oct. 13 -- "Peace terms may be very hard." "In twenty or twenty-five years France may again take her rightful place in a renovated Europe." These are passages from an address by General Henri Fernand Dentz, who commanded the French forces in Syria, delivered at Arles during the week-end when Admiral Francois Darlan, the Vice Premier, went there to confer decorations.
abstract: Sees France rising in 25 yrs; says peace terms will be hard, s at Arles

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST AREAS
